description: This file defines a custom UI component 'MovieRowView', a horizontally-scrollable row of movie cards designed specifically for TV D-pad navigation. It manages focus handling, item selection callbacks, and scroll positioning for a list of movies displayed as MovieCardView elements.

classes.name: MovieRowView
classes.description: A custom view for displaying a horizontally scrollable row of movie cards, optimized for TV navigation and focus management.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Populates the row with a list of MovieItem objects, creating and adding MovieCardView instances, and sets up focus and click behaviors.

methods.name: focusFirst
methods.description: Sets focus to the first movie card in the row.

methods.name: dispatchKeyEvent
methods.description: Handles key events for D-pad navigation, forwarding focus up/down or handling edge cases for left/right navigation.

methods.name: focusedChildIndex
methods.description: Returns the index of the currently focused child view within the container.

methods.name: ensureViewCentered
methods.description: Scrolls the view to center a specific child view for better focus visibility.

methods.name: dp
methods.description: Converts density-independent pixels (dp) to actual pixel units based on device density.
